courses.title: Introduction to Web Development
courses.description: Learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build and style your own websites.

courses.title: Advanced JavaScript
courses.description: Master advanced JavaScript concepts, including ES6+ features, closures, and async programming.

courses.title: React for Beginners
courses.description: Get started with React and build dynamic single-page applications with this popular JavaScript library.

courses.title: Full-Stack Web Development
courses.description: Learn both frontend and backend development to become a full-stack web developer using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

courses.title: Introduction to Python Programming
courses.description: Learn Python from scratch, covering syntax, data structures, and basic algorithms.
